Vegan Recipe

Add ½ cup Water
Add 25 ounces Spaghetti Sauce
Add 8 ounces Lentil Spaghetti
Add ½ cup Water (Don't stir)
Async 10 minutes Pressure cook on high pressure
Release steam valve and serve

1529 Calories

Recipe

Add 4 ounces Italian Sausage to instant pot
Timer 4 minutes Instant pot sautee Italian Sausage
Remove Italian Sausage from instant pot
Add ½ cup Water
Add 25 ounces Spaghetti Sauce
Add 8 ounces Whole Grain Spaghetti
Add ½ cup Water (Don't stir)
Async 8 minutes Pressure cook on high pressure
Release steam valve and serve
